name: Blocks (itch)
description:
You have a bar and different blocks to place. What do you do? Place them!

That's it. Not that special...
But it's fun!

There are 3 different kinds of play modes:

- Levels:
Play the normal 135 levels on three different difficulties.

- Random:
Play random generated levels, also in three different difficulties.

- Own:
Create your own levels. You can even choose one of three different difficulties.

Note: This is Version 0.4; the fifth version of the game.
Please report bugs!
